project.name: research-paper-analysis
project.description: Academic research paper analysis system for systematic literature review

assessment_dimensions.name: methodology
assessment_dimensions.specific_instructions: Evaluate research design, data collection methods, sample size, controls, and statistical analysis approaches

assessment_dimensions.name: contribution
assessment_dimensions.description: Novelty and significance of contribution to the field

criteria.1: No clear contribution or replicates existing work

assessment_dimensions.specific_instructions: Assess originality, theoretical advancement, practical applications, and potential impact on future research

assessment_dimensions.name: literature_review
assessment_dimensions.description: Quality and comprehensiveness of literature review
assessment_dimensions.specific_instructions: Evaluate coverage of relevant literature, critical analysis, identification of gaps, and theoretical framework

assessment_dimensions.name: clarity

criteria.4: Clear and well-organized with minor issues
criteria.3: Generally clear with some organizational problems
criteria.2: Unclear in places with structural issues

assessment_dimensions.specific_instructions: Assess logical flow, argument structure, use of evidence, and overall readability

assessment_dimensions.name: reproducibility

criteria.3: Partially reproducible with some details missing
criteria.2: Difficult to reproduce due to missing information
criteria.1: Not reproducible or lacks essential details

assessment_dimensions.specific_instructions: Evaluate availability of data, code, detailed protocols, and sufficient methodological detail

global_context.context_update_rules: Add emerging themes, methodological patterns, and research gaps observed across multiple papers
global_context.template:
# {project_name} - Research Context & Patterns

## Research Domain Overview
This document tracks emerging themes, methodological patterns, and research insights discovered during literature analysis.

## Discovered Patterns
*Add patterns that appear across 3+ papers and represent significant trends*

{sections}

## Research Guidelines
*Patterns that should inform future paper analysis*

{sections}

*This research context is automatically updated during the analysis process*

sections.name: Emerging Themes
sections.description: Common research themes and topics appearing across multiple papers

sections.name: Methodological Patterns
sections.description: Common research methodologies and approaches used in the literature

sections.name: Research Gaps
sections.description: Areas of research that appear underexplored or missing from the literature

sections.name: Key Findings
sections.description: Significant findings and conclusions that appear across multiple studies

sections.name: Theoretical Frameworks
sections.description: Common theoretical approaches and frameworks used in the research

sections.name: Future Directions
sections.description: Suggested areas for future research mentioned across papers

output_sections.name: literature_overview
output_sections.template:
## Literature Overview

Provide a comprehensive overview of the {file_count} papers analyzed, including key themes, methodological approaches, and research contexts.

output_sections.name: methodological_trends
output_sections.description: Analysis of methodological patterns and trends
output_sections.template:
## Methodological Trends

Identify and analyze methodological patterns, innovative approaches, and common limitations across the reviewed papers.

output_sections.name: theoretical_contributions
output_sections.template:
## Theoretical Contributions

Summarize major theoretical advances, frameworks, and conceptual contributions from the analyzed papers.

output_sections.name: research_gaps
output_sections.description: Identified research gaps and future directions
output_sections.template:
## Research Gaps and Future Directions

Identify systematic gaps in the literature and suggest promising directions for future research.

output_sections.name: quality_assessment
output_sections.template:
## Quality Assessment

Provide an overall assessment of the literature quality and recommendations for researchers in this field.
